synonyms.synonym: p53-inducible ribonucleotide reductase small subunit 2-like protein

protein.specific_function: Plays a pivotal role in cell survival by repairing damaged DNA in a p53/TP53-dependent manner. Supplies deoxyribonucleotides for DNA repair in cells arrested at G1 or G2. Contains an iron-tyrosyl free radical center required for catalysis. Forms an active ribonucleotide reductase (RNR) complex with RRM1 which is expressed both in resting and proliferating cells in response to DNA damage.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on ch or ch2 groups
oxidoreductase activity, acting on ch or ch2 groups, disulfide as acceptor
nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
nucleobase, nucleoside and nucleotide metabolic process
ribonucleoside-diphosphate reductase activity, thioredoxin disulfide as acceptor
